page.title: 16Accident Blackspot - One
page.content: The long straight section of the A74 which runs through Johnstonebridge is regarded by many as a very dangerous road. There have been many fatal accidents. Many road users appear to think that it is Motorway, when it is only a piece of Dual carriageway sandwiched between the M74 to the north and the M6 to the south. Because of this drivers may meet slow moving traffic like tractors, bicyles and pedestrians which they do not expect. One of the major hazards is when a vehicle crosses from the Northbound to the Southbound or vice versa. Traffic may indicate turning right,so vehicles behind assume that the driver is going to overtake, when in actual fact he will be slowing down to cut across the central reservation.
